name: THEOctogon
description:
WELCOME TO THEOCTOGON!

Collosium fighting is back but this time in a very different way. You have been given three lives to try OUTLIVE your fellow friends and foes to try and be the last one standing...

Win and you will be granted access to leave at your own will. But lose and you will have all of your lives switched off leaving you a rotting ragdoll left there FOREVER...

You have also been given new technology to help you win. You can pick your own weapon loadout at the before the start of the game .See you in the battle and good luck out there!(Your going to need it)

Notes:

  • This game is nowwhere near completion so don't expect alot when you download it
